attributes.action: Don't ban mobile phones in schools
attributes.additional_details: In the day and age we live in I believe taking this technology from a child is a bad 8dea and we as adults and parents often track our children by their location on their mobile phones. Without this vital piece of equipment anything could happen a child leading to dangerous and possible life threating situations.
attributes.background:
Banning mobile phones in schools could lead to a whole host of problems and unsafe situations resulting from a ban.
Many school children walk to and from school and a mobile is the only form of communication a child has that could save their lives

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Don't ban mobile phones in school:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646310
